---
title: "Introduction to git and GitHub"
editor: visual
author: Marina Vilardell
---


This course gives a brief introduction to version control with git and the gitHub repository. The course is aimed at user with an [Intermediate]{.underline} level of programming skills and and a basic knowledge of Linux and the Terminal.


**Topics covered:**

* Why use version control?
* basic Git workflow and commands
* Backtracking
* Remote repositories
* Branches
